summary: I HAD NOTICED SAGGING IN THE DOOR OF MY 2007 AIRSTREAM TRAILER.  AS I LOOKED UNDER THERE, I FOUND MY MAIN FRAME HAD SNAPPED IN HALF.  AS I EXPOSED MORE OF THE FRAME, I SAW ANOTHER BREAK, EXTENDING 14 INCHES UP THROUGH THE MIDDLE OF THE FRAME (WHICH COMES CLOSE TO SNAPPING THE FRAME IN HALF AGAIN). WHILE I'M NOT THE ORIGINAL OWNER, I'VE HAD THIS TRAILER FOR 5 YEARS AND CAN ATTEST IT HAS NOT BEEN IN AN ACCIDENT OR ABUSED SINCE I'VE OWNED IT.   UPDATED 8/15/13 *CN  *TR
WIRES ON THE 12 VOLT ELECTRICAL OUTLET OVERHEATED AND BURNED DESPITE PROPER FUSE INSTALLED IN FUSE BOX.  *TR
